about_the_game:
Welcome to Raghned, a realm of humans and spirits, where it never gets dark. Your future vessel awaits you at the Trisun Temple. Her name is Fade, and together you are destined to travel down the mountain and put an end to the slow destruction of the world.

FORGET ABOUT THE 4TH WALL

As the Player, you make a deal to take control over the main character, Fade. However, she is her own person, and your opinions on the best course of action may sometimes differ. The way you treat her will affect your relationship.

MORALITY-BASED LEVEL UP SYSTEM

There are 2 separate skill trees, which can be accessed by dealing with your enemies differently. Your gameplay experience is shaped by your choices.

DAY AND NIGHT

Long ago, day and night coexisted in an endless cycle, but they were separated into the Dayworld and the Nightworld. You are able to travel between those overlapping realities in order to solve puzzles and defeat enemies.

RESURRECTION

You will never be defeated unless you accept defeat. One of your special powers is to resurrect Fade as many times as you want instead of loading your last save. There is no limit, only a price to pay.

MEET SPIRITS, SHAPESHIFTERS, REVOLUTIONARIES AND MORE

Take a rest in a magical forest, uncover otherworldly secrets, or pick a side in a rebellion! A diverse cast of characters is waiting to meet you in the unique world of Raghned. Whether they will regret ever crossing your path is up to you.

content_descriptors.notes: general violence through combat; the mc goes through psychological suffering every time the player resurrects her, also she can be deliberately put through immense pain by the player in order to make her do certain things during the story

name: DOWNHILL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Experience unlimited power in DOWNHILL, a unique 4th wall breaking action RPG. Take control of a human girl named Fade and become her best friend or her worst enemy as you guide her down the mountain. Her fate is yours to decide, as well as the entire realm's.
